 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵיד‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Job.18.12|Job 18:12]]</sup> ==distress, calamity== (under which one bends, compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhIwAbAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAjABsAAAJZjI+py+0PowNAWkNr0zF7vngM91GPuWUB2K3sYbJviNLyfH1JfSG42/mlgj0ghKdAGo8/5UrihL2EvugStqk2p7iStyLapcJfp1VVxKbXbOo6zLZZ3/M4uwAAOw=="> ***burdening***) Bev<sup>Jphil. xxvi. 302</sup> derives from Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be strong*** [also ***oppress, burden***], whence <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (or <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***calamity.*** — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> [[Job.21.30|Job 21:30]] +; construct ***id.*** [[Job.31.23|Job 31:23]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵידי‎</span> [[2Sam.22.19|2Sam 22:19]] = [[Ps.18.19|Ps 18:19]] etc.; — ***distress, calamity*** (in poetry chiefly Wisdom Literature &amp; late); [[Prov.17.5|Prov 17:5]]; [[Prov.27.10|Prov 27:10]]. 

**1.** national calam. of Israel (apostate) [[Jer.18.17|Jer 18:17]]; [[Ezek.35.5|Ezek 35:5]]; [[Obad.1.13|Obad 1:13]] (3 t. in verse); of Egypt [[Jer.46.21|Jer 46:21]] Moab [[Jer.48.16|Jer 48:16]] Edom (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵשָׂו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span>) [[Jer.49.8|Jer 49:8]] Hazor v[[Jer.49.32|Jer 49:32]]. 

**2.** of righteous sufferer [[2Sam.22.19|2Sam 22:19]] = [[Ps.18.19|Ps 18:19]] compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> i.e. ***from*** God [[Job.31.23|Job 31:23]] &amp; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָרְחוֺת אֵידָם‎</span> [[Job.30.12|Job 30:12]] ***their calamitous paths*** (suffix reference to bereavement, pain, etc.) 

**3.**  often of wicked [[Job.18.12|Job 18:12]]; [[Job.21.17|Job 21:17]]; [[Job.31.3|Job 31:3]]; [[Prov.1.26|Prov 1:26]]; [[Prov.1.27|Prov 1:27]] (wisd. mocks at; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּחַד‎</span>) [[Prov.6.15|Prov 6:15]]; [[Prov.24.22|Prov 24:22]] also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺם א‎</span> [[Deut.32.35|Deut 32:35]]; [[Job.21.30|Job 21:30]] (compare above [[2Sam.22.19|2Sam 22:19]] = [[Ps.18.19|Ps 18:19]]; [[Prov.27.10|Prov 27:10]]; [[Jer.18.17|Jer 18:17]]; [[Jer.46.21|Jer 46:21]]; [[Obad.1.13|Obad 1:13]] (3 t. in verse) where \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺם אֹבֶד יוֺם צָרה‎</span> v[[Jer.46.12|Jer 46:12]] v[[Jer.46.14|Jer 46:14]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺם יהוה‎</span> v[[Jer.46.15|Jer 46:15]]).
